abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by jazz guitarist George Benson at Town Hall.
snippet: The guitarist George Benson performed covers, some of his original hits and selections from his new album, “Guitar Man,” at Town Hall on Friday.
lead_paragraph: The guitarist George Benson performed covers, some of his original hits and selections from his new album, “Guitar Man,” at Town Hall on Friday.

headline.main: ’60s Soul-Jazz Filtered Through a Quiet Storm
headline.print_headline: ’60s Soul-Jazz Filtered Through a Quiet Storm
headline.seo: George Benson Tours With ‘Guitar Man’ at Town Hall - Review
